title: Pumpkin Seed
summaries: Pumpkin Seeds are seeds which are used to plant Pumpkins. They may be planted on normal green grass or Hallowed grass, and will eventually grow into Pumpkins. They need 2 blocks width and 2 blocks height of clear space to grow, and can grow anywhere grass will grow.
Pumpkin Seeds are purchased from the Dryad for 2 SC50 CC each.

statistics.Max stack: 9999 (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) / 99 (Old-gen console and 3DS versions)
statistics.Buy: 2 SC50 CC
statistics.Sell: 50 CC
